adapter

Class ListViewAdapter

  • java.lang.Object
      • adapter.ListViewAdapter

  • public class ListViewAdapter
extends
    A List View Adapter which maps information from the comment model to the view Adapted from https://github.com/XUPINGI/PicPosterComplete/blob/master/src/ca/ualberta/cs/picposter/view/PicPostModelAdapter.java

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      View getView(int position, View convertView, ViewGroup parent)
      Maps different components of the comment object to the views of the CustomListView layout.
      void notifyDataSetChanged()
      Overrides the notifyDateSetChanged method, Before display the new content of the ListView, sort the Data with current sorting option.
      void setSortingLocation(Location location)
      Sort the ListView by the location provided(Comment more close to this location will appear at front).
      void setSortingOption(java.lang.String option)
      Set the current sorting option.
      void sortByDefault(Location location)
      Sort the ListView by the location provided and the ScoreSystem (Comment more close to this location and more fresh will appear at front).

               int textViewResourceId,

    • Method Detail

      • getView

        public View getView(int position,
           View convertView,
           ViewGroup parent)
        Maps different components of the comment object to the views of the CustomListView layout.
        Parameters:
        position - of the Object in the list.
        convertView - the view will be set.
        parent - the parent view.

      • setSortingLocation

        public void setSortingLocation(Location location)
        Sort the ListView by the location provided(Comment more close to this location will appear at front).
        Parameters:
        location - : a Location object which will be used as the sorting reference.

      • sortByDefault

        public void sortByDefault(Location location)
        Sort the ListView by the location provided and the ScoreSystem (Comment more close to this location and more fresh will appear at front).
        Parameters:
        location - : a Location object which will be used as the sorting reference.

      • notifyDataSetChanged

        public void notifyDataSetChanged()
        Overrides the notifyDateSetChanged method, Before display the new content of the ListView, sort the Data with current sorting option.

      • setSortingOption

        public void setSortingOption(java.lang.String option)
        Set the current sorting option.
        Parameters:
        option - : a String which is one of the sorting options.
